items.title: Pose estimator to check gym activities
items.description: Workflow using mediapipe lib to check orientation of body parts in real-time. The model is based on the BlazePose/mediapipe architecture, which is a lightweight model that can run on mobile devices in real-time. The model is able to detect 33 body parts, including the eyes, ears, nose, shoulders, elbows, wrists, hips, knees, and ankles.

items.title: TETO (NGO)
items.description: In Brazil since 2006, TETO is an organization formed by young volunteers who implement housing and habitat initiatives in precarious favelas alongside residents, strengthening capacities to develop self-managed communities and, thus, overcome poverty in our country. In 2023, TETO achieved the milestone of constructing 500 houses in the state of Paraná. Main experiences as volunteer: Database update and structuring of data compilation of socio-economic surveys ; Volunteer in Emergency Houses Construction Team (May and October 2015; April 2017)

items.title: Commemorative Mural of the Centenary of UTFPR (1909-2009)
items.description: The Federal Technological University of Paraná (UTFPR) celebrated its 100th anniversary on September 23, 2009. The institution was created as the School of Apprentice Craftsmen in 1909 by President Nilo Peçanha, and offered courses in trades such as tailoring, shoemaking, carpentry and metalworking. In 1978, it became the Federal Center for Technological Education of Paraná (Cefet-PR) and began offering full undergraduate courses.
